get.description: Retrieve supported chain IDs and their supported providers.

supportedProviders.description: List of supported provider IDs for this chain

get.description: Retrieve supported provider IDs and metadata.

items.description: Chain ID supported by the provider

post.summary: Get quote for zapping tokens across chains
post.description: Retrieve a quote for zapping tokens across chains. Supports optional parameters for adding or removing liquidity.

amount.description: Amount to swap or liquidity to add/remove (optional)

recipient.description: Recipient address for the swapped tokens

permit.description: Encoded permit2 data for ERC20 tokens (optional)

positionDetails.description: Optional position details for NFT-related operations

nftId.description: NFT ID associated with the zap

poolDetails.description: Optional pool details for liquidity operations

allowedBridges.description: Optional list of allowed bridges for the swap

allowedDexes.description: Optional list of allowed swap protocols for the swap

status.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful

amountOut.description: Estimated output amount after the zap

approvalData.description: Approval data if required for the transaction

approveTo.description: Address to approve for spending the token

callTo.description: Address to call for the approval

amount.description: Amount to approve in decimal format

path.description: List of steps in the path

estimatedDuration.description: Estimated duration for the action in seconds

included.description: Indicates if the fee is included in the amount or is charged separately from user balance

chainId.description: Chain ID where the asset exists.

decimals.description: Number of decimals for the asset.

price.description: Current price of the asset in USD.

chainId.description: Chain ID of the underlying token.

address.description: Contract address of the underlying token.

decimals.description: Number of decimals for the underlying token.

logo.description: URL to the underlying token logo.

post.description: Construct a transaction for zapping tokens across chains. Supports optional parameters for adding or removing liquidity.

permit.description: Encoded permit2 data for ERC20 tokens (optional)

positionDetails.description: Optional position details for NFT-related operations

poolDetails.description: Optional pool details for liquidity operations

included.description: Indicates if the fee is included in the amount or is charged separately from user balance

get.description: Retrieve the status and details of a transaction based on its hash and chain ID.

parameters.name: txnHash
parameters.description: Transaction hash to check the status for.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Chain ID where the transaction was executed.

200.description: Successful response with transaction status and details

action.description: Type of action performed in this step.

chainId.description: Chain ID where the step was executed.

input.description: Input assets used in the transaction.

amount.description: Amount of the asset in its native decimal representation.

decimals.description: Number of decimals for the asset.

decimals.description: Number of decimals for the underlying token.

logo.description: URL to the underlying token logo.

get.description: Retrieve transaction history for a specific user account with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: Ethereum address of the user account.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of transactions to return per page.

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: Filter transactions by specific blockchain network ID.

200.description: Successful response with paginated transaction history

action.description: Type of action performed in this step.

chainId.description: Chain ID where the step was executed.

input.description: Input assets used in the transaction.

amount.description: Amount of the asset in its native decimal representation.

chainId.description: Chain ID where the asset exists.

decimals.description: Number of decimals for the asset.

price.description: Current price of the asset in USD.
